aptness noun [U]
(SUITABLE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being suitable or right for a particular situation: the aptness of his comment
More examplesFewer examplesThere is an undeniable aptness to the description.Fizz lost her temper, demonstrating the aptness of her nickname.Their ironic and often hilarious effect comes from the aptness of the choice of words.The commentary might be applied with equal aptness to dozens of other novels of this decade.
